name: REG_HX_CONFRM_ERRS
description: This table contains information related to confirmation errors that have occurred during registration encounters.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the note (HNO) record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CONFRM_ERR_PPT_ID
columns.description: Stores the programming point (LPP) ID that caused an error.
